snippet: The husband of Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the jailed opposition leader, wants to prevent authorities from pressuring her through her family, Ms. Tymoshenko’s party announced.
abstract: Czech Republic grants political asylum to Oleksandr Tymoshenko, husband of jailed Ukrainian opposition leader Yulia V Tymoshenko.
lead_paragraph: The husband of Yulia V. Tymoshenko, the jailed opposition leader, wants to prevent authorities from pressuring her through her family, Ms. Tymoshenko’s party announced.

headline.main: Jailed Ukrainian Leader’s Husband Seeks Asylum in Czech Republic
headline.print_headline: Jailed Ukraine Party Leader’s Husband Wins Czech Asylum
